content: Started at the new firm. First day was intense but exhilarating. My project is getting traction, and I'm learning a lot about managing a team. Also, had a mentor session on the emotional rollercoaster of trading. It's not just about the numbers.

AI model is now integrated into the firm's trading platform. We're seeing promising results. Also, been thinking about how blockchain could decentralize trading, reducing manipulation. The learning curve is steep but worth it.

Just got an invitation to speak at a local tech conference about AI in finance. It's a validation of my work. Also, been working on a side project to understand how smart contracts could automate trade settlements.

The conference went well. Got some great questions on AI ethics in trading. Also, met a blockchain developer who's working on a DeFi platform. We're planning to collaborate on a project to enhance trading security.

Our team's performance has been impressive. The AI model is now a core part of our strategy. Also, started a series of blog posts on how blockchain can revolutionize trading. Sharing knowledge feels rewarding.

Got a call from the big quant firm. They're interested in my work again. Seems like the AI model and my blockchain insights have caught their attention. Life in NYC is full of surprises, but I'm ready for the next chapter.
